The Next Generation of Config Management

Master Your
Development Workflow

Generate battle-tested boilerplate configurations for .gitignore, .gitattributes, and more. Instantly tailored to your stack.

Smart Detection

Automatically detects your project dependencies and recommends the perfect configuration settings.

Multi-File Generation

Create .gitignore, .dockerignore, and .editorconfig files simultaneously with a unified interface.

Industry Standards

Templates based on best practices from top tech companies and open-source communities.

Community Driven
